title: Best of The Herd: 08/15/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/15/2019
description:
Colin says that OBJ is an all time talent but might never be an all time great receiver because he can't stay healthy.  The Cowboys want to pay their "triplets" top dollar but in reality they're not even close to the best "triplets" in the NFL.  Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks about one major concern he has with Aaron Rodgers in a new offense  in Green Bay 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
